p: The increased DRTF Klf4 regulated the expression of the increased DEGs encoding metabolic enzymes involved in fatty acid degradation ( Ascl5, Acadm, Echs1, and Acaa1b) and of Hmgcl (encoding HMG-CoA lyase involved in ketone body synthesis) in liver of ob/ ob mice. Klf4 is a crucial regulator of mitochondrial homeostasis in cardiac muscle ( Liao etÂ al., 2015), but its role in organismal or liver metabolism is still largely unknown. Klf4 may be an important regulator contributing to ketone body production in liver of ob/ ob mice.
